document_data.caption: The Spires of Mir in 1479 DR.
document_data.name: Spires of Mir
document_data.mainbody: The '''Spires of Mir''' were a wasteland of strange stone spires located in southern [[Tethyr]], just north of the [[Marching Mountains]].
document_data.Geography: Prior to the [[Spellplague]], the spires were part of the [[Forest of Mir]], but the plague changed the trees into huge stone spires. Not only was the landscape warped by the Spellplague, but so too were the creatures that roamed the land, which were transformed into dangerous beasts. The only settlement of note within the spires was [[Argentor]], which was inhabited by [[Earthsoul genasi]].
